name: obsidian-attachment-name-formattion
description: Obsidian plugin for formatting attachments name (filename attachmentType indexNumber.xxx)

scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.version: node scripts/version-bump.mjs %npm_config_new% && git add manifest.json versions.json package.json && git commit --amend --no-edit && git tag %npm_config_new%
